name: Sparky
text:
Sparky
Sparky worked as an assistant at Big Ed's Gas Farm.
On February 19, 1989, Sparky watched from Ed Hurley's living room as Nadine skinned a deer hanging from their tree outside. Ed joked that pretending to do a poor job and letting her take over worked every year, while Sparky remarked that his own wife couldn't take the wrapper off a Twinkie.
Sparky only appears in the shooting script of Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me. It is unknown if the scene was filmed.
